group_1.textRight: If I continue to be a buddyguard...@I might let someone die again...
...I might even let Kako or Felicia die...!

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry...for not considering your feelings...

group_1.textRight: The reason we started being bodyguards@in the first place...
...was to respect Ayame's wish to@protect her friends.

group_1.textLeft: Indeed... I don't want to force you...
Ayame wouldn't be able to see her friends...

group_1.textRight: I don't think the rumors about us are@going away anytime soon.
We should just stay low for a while and not get@involved with any other Magical Girls...
You're okay with that, right, Ayame?

group_1.narration: After officially quitting our work as bodyguards...@Ayame became afraid of@being involved in someone's death,@and began to stay cooped up at home.
Because Ayame's Soul Gem became cloudy frequently,@the two of us spent our days@incessantly hunting Witches for Grief Seeds...

As a result...@We were so busy getting through the day that we@naturally stopped associating with other Magical Girls@and returned to the original situation we were in@when we first moved to Kamihama...
At that time, if we hadn't taken@only Ayame's feelings into consideration,@discussed it amongst ourselves further,@and continued our work as bodyguards,@our lives might have been different...
